Subject: AO/GH provides final TOBT t minutes before EOBT
Source Text: Definition The time at which the Aircraft Operator or Ground Handler provide their most accurate TOBT taking into account the operational situation.

Subject: AO/GH provides final TOBT t minutes before EOBT
Source Text: Origin and priority The Aircraft Operator / Ground Handler provides the information.

Subject: AO/GH provides final TOBT t minutes before EOBT
Source Text: Timing The information is provided t minutes before EOBT (t is a parameter time agreed locally).

Subject: ATC establishes push back/pre-departure sequence
Source Text: An accurate TOBT at [EOBT-t minutes] is a pre-requisite for ATC to establish a push back / pre-departure sequence.

Subject: AO/GH provides final TOBT t minutes before EOBT
Source Text: An accurate TOBT at [EOBT-t minutes] is a pre-requisite for ATC to establish a push back / pre-departure sequence.

Subject: Aircraft Operator computes TOBT strategy
Source Text: Emphasis is put on the need for the Aircraft Operator to integrate his own strategy to compute a TOBT related to the flight.

Subject: ATC system receives TOBT
Source Text: Following the receipt of the TOBT, the ATC system will calculate and provide the Estimated Taxi-Out Time (EXOT)

Subject: ATC system calculates EXOT
Source Text: the ATC system will calculate and provide the Estimated Taxi-Out Time (EXOT) based on the predicted traffic load, gate / stand location, runway in use, and waiting period at the Holding Position, etc.

Subject: ATC system provides EXOT
Source Text: the ATC system will calculate and provide the Estimated Taxi-Out Time (EXOT)

Subject: Flight introduced into pre-departure sequence
Source Text: The flight is introduced into the pre-departure sequence.

Subject: AO/GH manages turn-round process
Source Text: The Aircraft Operator / Ground Handler, in coordination with the aircrew, can manage the turn-round process accordingly.

Subject: Check AO/GH TOBT consistency with ATC Flight Plan
Source Text: Procedures To check whether the AO/GH TOBT is consistent with the ATC Flight Plan.

Subject: Network Operations informed of TTOT changes
Source Text: Network Operations is informed when the TTOT changes by more than the agreed TTOT tolerance.

Subject: Perform TOBT confirmation check
Source Text: This check should be performed at a predefined time (local parameter) to confirm TOBT prior to TSAT issue

Subject: Verify ATC Flight Plan feasibility
Source Text: verify feasibility of the ATC Flight Plan estimates given the updated TOBT.

Subject: Respect TTOT tolerance
Source Text: A TTOT tolerance is respected before Network Operations is informed on updated TTOT.

Subject: New TOBT or TTOT update
Source Text: Action on CDM This process is triggered by n a new TOBT or TTOT update.

Subject: Milestone Process activated
Source Text: This Milestone Process is actually constantly applicable in the CDM Platform, as soon as a TOBT is available.

Subject: AO/GH checks TOBT quality
Source Text: However the confirmed TOBT prior to TSAT has special status, where AO/GH check the quality of TOBT before TSAT issue.

Subject: Manually modified TOBT confirmation skipped
Source Text: No need to confirm an existing TOBT if it has been manually modified before.
